Eat Local Classics
Chicken Caesar
Locally made roasted garlic caesar dressing as a base, spinach, mozzarella, chicken, local bacon, and local extra old gouda. Comes with a lemon wedge.

$29.99

George's Market Sausage Pizza
Rosemary cream base, with mozzarella, a double helping of George's Market Pizza Sausage (contains tomato and dairy), thick cut mushrooms, roasted red peppers and a balsamic glaze drizzle.

$29.99

Market Meat
Our cream based market sauce, mozzarella, pepperoni, local ground beef, local sausage, local bacon, local kielbasa, local garlic cheese curds.

$29.99

Perogie
Our cream based market sauce, mozzarella, local perogies, local bacon, local extra old gouda, in store made caramelized onions. Comes with two sour cream dipping sauces.

$29.99

Philly Cheese
Our cream based market sauce, mozzarella, philly beef, caramelized onion, red onion, mushroom, green peppers, provolone cheese.

$29.99
